This game is terrible. 7 days after 7 days becuase bots walk in front of you, people team kill you and random things. its literally un playable. there is no moderation of toxic behaviour so you are almost guaranteed to have a terrible person on your team, who will kick, team damage and scream at you untill your ears bleed. its a hellscape worse than cod lobbies.

 Valve does not care about racism and toxicity people face, they want children to use thier gambling site and take thier money. thats it. this is not a shooter game. it is a game where u can loose money on slots while a racist middle aged man calls you the n word and team kills you for standing in the wrong spot. i dont know how anybody in thier right mind would want to play this with thier free time.  

terrible game 0 stars / 0/10 / even for a slot machine the returns are terrible. honestly just go to a regular casino and buy a real gun with your money instead of a 1000 AWP. at this point id rather get dinked by an ak in real life than in csgo one more time, and my average teammates would probably want that for me as well

Great game, it has multiple levels of difficulty when playing matchmaking. Aside from that you also get to learn what it feels like to be a detective. What I mean by that is that with every match you play you get to discuss with your teammates if the enemies are cheating, smurfing or both.

Overall fun game, if it weren't for the cheaters and the smurfs you encounter in MM.

Also your teammates are most likely boosted.
